description:
Izumi fights back against the figure in Eriko`s hospital room. After parting ways with Kaito, Kei receives a mysterious invitation.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: As-tu déjà vu un fantôme noir ?
Have You Ever Seen a Black Ghost?
Hiç Kara Bir Hayalet Gördünüz Mü?
Kimi wa Kuroi Yuurei o Mita Koto ga Aruka?
君は黒い幽霊を見たことがあるか?
넌 검은 유령을 본 적 있나?
